member.name: NOTIFYICONIDENTIFIER
member.summary: Contains information used by to identify the icon for which to retrieve the bounding rectangle.

member.name: NOTIFYICONIDENTIFIER.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: NOTIFYICONIDENTIFIER.hWnd
member.summary: A handle to the parent window used by the notification's callback function. For more information, see the hWnd member of the structure.

member.name: NOTIFYICONIDENTIFIER.uID
member.summary: The application-defined identifier of the notification icon. Multiple icons can be associated with a single hWnd, each with their own uID.

member.name: NOTIFYICONIDENTIFIER.guidItem
member.summary: A registered GUID that identifies the icon. Use GUID_NULL if the icon is not identified by a GUID.
